welcome.setupIntro: Let's setup your experience in a few short steps.
welcome.warning: Warning: This is pre-release software and may contain bugs.

wizard.title: Update Wizard
wizard.description: Let's ensure your data is moved across safely! Click next to continue.

access.title: Ease of Access
access.description: Customize your experience to ensure that everything feels just right.

colors.title: Choose your color
colors.description: Pick a color that matches your mood.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Access to contacts is needed to display your contacts live tile.

photos.title: Photos
photos.description: Access to photos is needed to display your photos live tile.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Access to notifications is needed to display your notifications live tile.

finish.title: Get ready to Groove
finish.description: Your setup is done. Time to dive in!
